name: Robert (Kacey Halstead)
description:
Robert

Follow Robert, a sentient robot, on his mission to escape the factory in which he was made. He will encounter different puzzles and obstacles on his journey to freedom, but his sentience and humanity will strengthen along the way. 

Can you help Robert find his way to freedom?

This game was made for the GoedWare Game Jam, which had the themes "Love, Death and Robots" and "The price of freedom".

Music by Coma-Media from Pixabay
